effect.scarlet_violet: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.
